The critical move to ban so-called conversion therapy by Puerto Rico’s Governor @ricardorossello will protect LGBTQ youth from this horrible practice. Conversion therapy has already been banned in 15 states plus D.C. — and I’ve co-sponsored a bill to ban it nationwide.

After more than 11 years, today is @Kelli_H’s last day with our team. Kelli, @AnnRomney and I will forever be grateful for all you’ve done to keep the trains moving, and the impact you’ve had on our lives. Best of luck in your next adventure. You’ll be sorely missed! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D21kg0EWwAE8sGQ.jpg

Whether I’m home in Newark or on the road, I hear story after story of how broken our health care system is. We need to take practical steps to fix it and I believe Medicare for all is the best way to get there. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D22IgTNW0AEbCuF.jpg

Our country is facing a major housing crisis. In one of the wealthiest countries in the world, millions of Americans are being forced to make tough choices between paying rent on time or taking care of their families.
